Delete:
assign burst_in   =    etx_write                 & //write 
	       	         (etx_datamode[1:0]==2'b11) & //double only
		          burst_type_match          & //same types
Add:
assign tx_burst     =  tx_access                  & //avoid garbage
                          ~tx_wr_wait_reg            & //clear on wait
                          etx_write                  & //write 
	       	          (etx_datamode[1:0]==2'b11) & //double only
		          burst_type_match           & //same types
